summary: Allow the use of Powershell to evaluate some buffer lines
name: powershellCall
description:
This script provide 2 commands permitting some dialog with Microsoft Powershell.

Lines can be evaluated within vim, no filtering allowed for the moment.

GitHub : https://github.com/Twinside/vim-powershellCall
install_details: drop it in your ~/.vim/plugin or ~/vimfiles/plugin directory, or better make a powershellCall folder in your bundle directory using pathogen
